About Me

Hi, my name’s Dâmaso and I’m a software engineering student at Universidade de Brasilia. As well as study I also participe in some projects at UnB, and also work as a Computing Teacher. I have worked at some groups and subjects gaining teamwork experiences.

I am most skilled in: Software Documentation and Playing Games

Projects

Decipherer

https://gitlab.com/oo-2018.1/EP1

This is a project from "Object Oriented" Subject from UnB. It was made in C++.

I make this project to learn more about Object Oriented paradigms, and it was great to also learn more about the language and logical programming.

Ruby on Rails Website

https://gitlab.com/xRegis/EP3-RAILS

This is a project from "Object Oriented" Subject from UnB. It was made in Ruby using Ruby on Rails framework.

Me and my friend made this project to learn more about Ruby and the framework Rails. This is a website which everyone can create events and share them.

Integra Vendas

https://github.com/fga-eps-mds/2018.2-Integra-Vendas

This project was a great project that I participate in a college subject. I used to work with other 9 people and in that time, I made my teamwork skills really better

For this project development. 10 people used to develop and write all the documentation about an especific project. We gathered every week to do all the Scrum ritual. Following all the stages to get this project done and also learning about teamwork, pair programming, agile methodology and more.

FIOTEC

http://www.fiotec.fiocruz.br/

Software developer

May 2019 - Present

Developing a system to automate and get better a hospital flow and improve the attendance.

I am oriented by a teacher from UnB to develop a system that automate the actual system in the Hospital Regional da Asa Norte (HRAN) who actually is made in paper, and sometimes this information is lost by the time. And it’s such a important thing to store all information from patients in order to get their evolution.

Teaching people how to use a computer, and how to do the basic stuff.

In Brazil, the unemployment is a great problem to unqualified people. Have a knowledge about computing is really important to labor market, because the hirers are looking for people that produce more, and my jobs help this people to get their qualifications.

Education

Universidade de Brasília (UnB)

Bachelor Software Engineering

2017 - Present

Established in 1962, UnB is one of the greatest education institution in Brazil, UnB has develop a lot of research and it is widely regarded a great University in Brazil in comparison to others Universitys.

During my time at UnB, I learnt and I am learning everything that I know, and I need to know about software engineering, and all stuff about documentation and programming paradigms. I am really engaged about what I can do, to make the world better, and it’s just seems incredible.

I have worked as cheerleading and clubs advisor at College Athletic, and it was wonderful because I improve my teamwork experiences.
